com.hybris.cis.common.utils

Class IsoCodesCountriesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.common.utils.IsoCodesCountriesUtils

  • public final class IsoCodesCountriesUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils class to calculate the 2 letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code from country names.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getIsoCode

        public static java.lang.String getIsoCode(java.lang.String countryName)
        Calculate the iso code from countryName. If country name is already an isoCode, then this isoCode is returned. This method is not case sensitive and should not be affected by accents.
        Parameters:
        countryName -
        Returns:
